website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy NotePRO Android tablet mates a giant screen with an equally giant price, but if productivity is a top priority, you're better off with a Windows alternative.

customer_reviews.title: WORST TABLET EVER - SAMSUNG SHOULD BE ASHAMED
customer_reviews.text: Has to be one of the worst tablets EVER! Samsung support and service is AWFUL. Tablet has KNOWN problem... many tablets out of the box experience screen FLICKER shen charge goes down below 60%. SAMSUNG support is just awful... they play so many games and deny that they have an issue.... do yourself a favor and find another large tablet that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Yankee1958i

customer_reviews.title: Re-boots constantly when wi-fi turns on. Defective product!!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet has some sort of Factory defect where Only when Wi-Fi is turned on the tablet keeps automatically re-booting. Tried factory re-boot to no pre-vail. wrote seller e-mail and no response. A month later I'm deployed overseas with no way of a return or refund. Out Hundreds of dollars with no refund in site. Not too pleased.
customer_reviews.author: AgapeCharlie

customer_reviews.title: Great 12.2 Samsung Note, especially after Android update to v5.01
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I really like this 12.2 tablet. Nice big screen. Easy to work with. Great resolution and clear sound. Full marks to Samsung. It came as Android version 4.4 but it updated to 5.01. This resolved the problem other users reported when attempting to install Amazon Video, which now works flawlessly after the Android update. I added a Samsung 64 GB class 10 micro SD card, for additional memory capacity, and purchased an Amazon USB 3.0 connector cable making transfers even faster. I also added a Fintie 12.2 Note 360 swivel case purchased through Amazon. Very pleased with the whole setup.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet - pitiful USB cable that comes with it though
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet! It replaced an aging iPad that's still in pristine condition after 6 years of use. Note that the USB cable that comes with the unit is crap - comes apart at the USB 3.0 connection. Samsung Support tried to deny warranty on the cable after no more than 3 months of "adult-only" use. Took me getting "insulted" by them eluding to this being physical damage before they would send me another under warranty. It's not physical damage, it's a poorly designed cable as can easily be seen in the accompanying photo.
customer_reviews.author: iT_Pro

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work and has to be returned.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I'm going to have to return the device. It keeps getting into a screen flickering and rebooting loop. I've never been able to charge it over about 20%. This seems to be a known manufacturing defect with the internal battery connections. I think I shall have to buy some different product because I think I would just be sent another one with the same defect.
customer_reviews.author: Richard V. Downing

customer_reviews.title: No buy from this seller
customer_reviews.text: Well it didn't take 30 days before it developed charging problems, slow charging and then no charging. I tried clearing the cache, no difference. I then wiped it and it charged up to full once with little issue. Now it can charge overnight and won't top 30%. Little surprise that a call placed to the seller and message left received no response. Finally received a response. Returned the tablet and got another one. Less than one year later. Same problem. Slow charge and then no charge. So that was $300 bucks wasted.
customer_reviews.author: RMFIRE

customer_reviews.title: Great seller,  great tabby!
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet...not as fast as a lot of Samsung's latest tablets, but size matters. Root this tablet for sure. In order to over-clock it and get it much faster & customisable! Too bad this size of tabby didn't catch on...
customer_reviews.author: Gurbo

customer_reviews.title: Pity about the Samsung Galaxy Perks (gone).
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased the 12.2 Note Pro as a long overdue replacement for my stolen Note 8.0. Went to check out the Galaxy Perks it would come with - Samsung have terminated their Perks program so any of those lovely Youtube videos listing the many extras are now seemingly very out of date. Not saying it would have changed my mind, I've been looking at the 12.2 for a while but the added bonuses were a nice extra - we'll see whether that also includes the Dropbox space - if not then the Amazon page should be altered to either eliminate reference to the Perks or advise new customers that there are no more 'Perks'
customer_reviews.author: Mathguy

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, worked for 6 mos then WiFi quit working.
customer_reviews.text: The item worked great for 6 months then the WiFi suddenly stopped working. Wouldn’t connect to any WiFi. Contacted Samsung and returned product for repair but Samsung said too old,no parts available and returned my tablet. Now I’m stuck with what is essentially a useless tablet. Samsung would not replace either. Will never buy another Samsung product again.
customer_reviews.author: Navajo

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money, used device
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for reading sheet music, so didn't tap into all the possibilities. Pen is really nice. Only came with a charging cable and a pen. Charging is SLOW. Had an annoying add that popped on the screen and it said "your phone is charging" when plugged in. Suppose it's android but doesn't know it's a tablet - kinda like it thinks it's a unicorn...
customer_reviews.author: Octavian Mbv

customer_reviews.title: Pro Tablet indeed!
customer_reviews.text: All i can say is WOW!!this thing amazes me every day. Everything ive thrown at it, it handles it. I will make a more indepth review coming soon. But as for a nice Profession tablet, it works really well for my needs. I just do PDF and Word documents, some email and web browsing. I do alot of videos on You Tube and Music. This tablet is a must for business professionals looking to step up from iPad. Even the iPad Pro 12" will have a run for its money. The multi tasking is unmatch by any tablet on the market today! I can have 5 to 6 windows open and have everything run smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Srelles Tech

customer_reviews.title: Great for Musicians and fun entertainment alike.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for one particular reason as a musician, I needed something that would show an 8 1/2 x 11" page of music digitally. The display is clear and bright. This tablet moves from page to page using Planning Center's "Music Stand" with ease. It is also great for watching movies, YouTube or just plain surfing. Coupled with a bluetooth keyboard, it can be used almost like a laptop. As it is Android, there are some functions it cannot do like Facebook Ad Manager. Overall, it is a wonderful tool.
customer_reviews.author: Todd R. Thonen

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet... but charging port has problems
customer_reviews.text: The tablet itself is great. There is one problem with the tablet. That being the charging port. If you do a search online you will find a lot of complaints about this issue. I have had my tablet for less than one month and it stopped charging. While I am very pleased with the seller accepting a return and replacing it this is a major inconvenience. I researched how to replace the port which is not that difficult. The reason I returned is I had for only a month if I was outside of my return period I would have replaced port myself
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Henry

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I mean wow! Display is gorgeous. Works extremely well. Fast. Only slightly bigger than my old 10.1. Reading magazines is like reading them in print. Netflix looks great too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holy Tablet Batman!!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the best tablets I've ever used. I have all the generations of iPads, they're good but this thing is great! I'm very satisfied with it's performance. Multiple windowing is awesome, the resolution is incredible, the speed is amazing. If you're in the market for a higher priced tablet, I'd say go with this one. I haven't found anything that I don't like about it.
customer_reviews.author: RobT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, enough said.
customer_reviews.text: Best tablet I've owned. And I've had a few. S pen features are excellent for those who like to write notes but want to have then digitally stored. When I got a keyboard and mouse could easily replace a laptop. Specially with office suite which is offered free with prime.
customer_reviews.author: Franco

customer_reviews.title: Hello Samsung - goodby Apple
customer_reviews.text: Finally decided to give another tech company a shot after 8+ years of Apple iphones and ipods. And I'm so glad I did. Samsung look, feel, features and OS is light years ahead of Apple. Somehow overnight Samsung jumped beyond the competition and created superior products. I even have a Samsung refrigerator. Their smart TV's are also wonderful. If they made one, I'd buy a Samsung car. I'm sold on the brand.
customer_reviews.author: U2

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is my second tablet I have owned after the Kindle fire hd. The screen is beautiful, tablet feels light for the size, is super fast, and very customizable. I get around 10 hours of screen time at medium brightness. It is great for comics, magazines, flipboard, Web browsing, and I like drawing with the sketchbook app and included s pen. I am looking for a good full size stylus if anyone has any recommendations. Overall I am very pleased with this device and am glad I went with this instead of a 10 inch model.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: The screen is absolutely fantastic. It makes email and web sites SO much easier to read. Plus pictures look fabulous. Maps are both easier to read and show a "bigger picture". The primary purpose for this was for on the go Bible study, and it is awesome to be able to have multiple windows open with various resources that can easily be seen all at once. Batter life is excellent. The good is that it's big, the bad is that it's big. :) You pay for the size and battery life with weight. But for me the tradeoff was more than worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tropic Bound

customer_reviews.title: Wife doesn't want any other tablet
customer_reviews.text: My wife is on her third one. She loves the large screen. Why 3rd? She left the first one on a train and dropped the 2nd one on its corner on a tile floor. Second one still works but the glass is mostly splinters. She tries all the tablets she can and always likes Galaxy * Pro 12.2 models best.
customer_reviews.author: MarkTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Great till I just noticed a dent on the left bezel
customer_reviews.text: So far it's great! Love the big screen, crystal quality display and features!! Its a bigger version of my note 3. My only issue on day 2 of receiving it, is that i noticed a dent on the bezel top left. This makes me wonder if this item is POSSIBLY refurbished as many stores do or even Samsung itself?! If I'm paying for brand new, I should get brand new! Is there any way to tell if this tablet had an owner before??
customer_reviews.author: MARISSA G

customer_reviews.title: Dealer does not follow up!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product fine but the seller said they were going to get me a charging cord but haven't good thing I had one to use !!! So I guess I am giving seller a not so good review!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherian Delozier

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet I have and I have a lot of them.
customer_reviews.text: Light and fast. I have an iPad, Surface, and Kindle Fire gen1. Love this. The interface takes a little getting used to. The Surface was a bit more intuituve, but that probably says more about me than the android OS. The keyboard is the best I have ever used and the display is so large and clear I have trouble putting it down. Using the stylus with Sketchbook is a joy. Finally, I get to draw with a stylus that recognizes sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D (Dallas, TX)

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Note 10.1. I have had it for 2 weeks. For me, it does everything my 10.1 did but with a much bigger screen which is great. I am an electronic repair tech so whether I am pulling up my repair tickets, my "how to" notes, watching a movie at lunch or at home, my emails or remoting into my pc. It is perfect. If you loved your Note 10.1 you will love this one even more.
customer_reviews.author: Mirage

customer_reviews.title: my new favorite tablet!  Takes 256GB microSD card!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome screen on this tablet. Extremely high quality. The back of the tablet has a really nice leather, which I did not expect. The quality of the screen on this tablet is really good. I purchased a Samsung 256GB microSD card for this tablet, and it works fine with the tablet. TONS of memory space....
customer_reviews.author: calc

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Been using the tablet for the past few months and must say that it works great. I am college student and even though some may find it "too big" I find that it is a good size, a very good alternative to a laptop. It may be large but it is still smaller than a laptop and the s pen makes taking notes very easy. The s pen accuracy is incredable. I recommend it to everyone, not just students but everyone that needs a good daily device that can connect to the inter and do normal tasks. I think this makes a great student or work device, powerful, fast and all around a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Petrzilka

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Been going strong for 2 years now ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Been going strong for 2 years now as a refurbished unit. The battery is excellent and to this date there still isn't a tablet I'd rather have. The only advice i would give samsung is start putting USB ports on your devices!
customer_reviews.author: Darius Suddreth

customer_reviews.title: Best Tablet Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 3 1/2 years! best purchase I ever made. This is by far the finest electronic tablet ever made, clear pics, good sound, easy to use, and just marvelous!
customer_reviews.author: yvonne

customer_reviews.title: everything they say  it is
customer_reviews.text: This is the tablet to have. I bought this for my husband ,he loves it. He never has had a tablet and is able to pick up all the tech really quick,it's so easy. He loves the fact that you mm can run two to four windows at once . He really wanted a stylist and th one is wonderful. Writing is smooth and very easy to take notes . If this is your first tablet or your third it will be your favorite. The screen quality is just amazing ,they brag about it and rightly so! haven't found any draw backs yet ....having to much fun.
customer_reviews.author: tee_bird

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tablet.
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a PC replacement, but it is a fantastic tablet in general. Only took a week to integrate into my workday. It is big, but that was one of the appealing factors for me. The price is justified, in that it does the things I want it to do in the manner I want to do them. About the only drawback is for Amazon, who I bought this tablet through. Since I can't stream amazon digital video purchases on an Android device (that isn't a Kindle that is), I have lost a major incentive to renew my prime subscription with them.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Gaynor

customer_reviews.title: Really like this tablet
customer_reviews.text: Really like this tablet. The size and speed have been great. I bought the refurbished model and saved a lot of money. I can't find any flaws with the refurbishment. I have some issues with the Samsung Bloat ware but I expect their bloat when I bought on of their products. The tablet was easy to set up and took all of its updates quickly. If you wish to Root the tablet look around for a rout method that doesn't cause issues with KNOX.
customer_reviews.author: T. Adams

customer_reviews.title: DON’T1
customer_reviews.text: This was the most aggravating, consistently not-functioning - as advertised - now - when looking back - piece of junk - that perhaps I was ever foolish enough to buy. I WILL NEVER BUY ANOTHER SAMSUNG PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Harold Edward Wills

customer_reviews.title: It has everything needed on a tablet !!
customer_reviews.text: Great Size, Price and Screen..Works great..Would buy another if need to and recommend highly !!
customer_reviews.author: Helper

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: As a artist, i really do love this for sketching. I was considering this and the cintiq by wacom but it was too expensive for something i MIGHT like. Had the surface pro as a gift and this still gets more use! Theres nothing i can really say bad about it, maybe that it gets warm but nowhere near as warm/hot as the surface pro.
customer_reviews.author: mannie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing technology
customer_reviews.text: First off, i bought a refurbed unit, and the screen was messed up (chance you take to save a buck). My replacement (also a refurb) came quickly and has been perfect. Amazing tablet! Works beautifully. Fast and responsive. Stylus works very naturally. Battery life not as great as my 10-inch but still decent. Packed with all kinds of great apps. 12-inch is definitely the way to go... perfect for viewing the web and doing work. The screen is clear and beautiful. It's really an amazing computer for the price. Haven't yet found anything it can't handle. Highly recommend Samsung's Galaxy Note 12.
customer_reviews.author: areftee

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tablet I've ever used. The stylus is incredibly useful to write notes and the fact that the screen is so large really makes you feel like you're just using an actual notepad. The performance is also very snappy and the resolution makes reading anything on it a pleasure. I use this for reading sheet music and it performs exceptionally well. The professional reviewers that don't like this tablet are DEAD WRONG.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Finarovsky

customer_reviews.title: Love the computer
customer_reviews.text: I received it & had to replace the battery immediately. But I did expect that. It is a Great tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Grrrrr

customer_reviews.title: This tablet is great!! Ordered 3 nights ago with Priority shipping ...
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is great!! Ordered 3 nights ago with Priority shipping for PR and i got it last night. Used it today for my classes. This is an excellent tablet for students. I basically replaced all my paper notebooks with this. This will definetly help me be more organized now and have less of a mess in my room and my backpack not to mention that it will be easier now to find my class notes when i want them with just the touch of a screen.
customer_reviews.author: Reynaldo Carrasquillo

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best tablet from Samsung
customer_reviews.text: I have this tablet for more than 3 years. It works just fine. It was used intensively every day. I had the battery replaced few months ago, but I hadn't notice a significant change. I still have tab 3 and galaxy pro 10", but this one is by far much better. I hope Samsung will consider another note pro tablet after note 8 series.
customer_reviews.author: Ciprian Soldan

customer_reviews.title: Learning something new everyday
customer_reviews.text: I have had 4 different tables and this is by far the best one I have ever had. Forget about the size. Yes size doesn't matter. This tablet is packed with so much. I am learning something new from it everyday. I have had this table for over 2 months and it still amazes me. Be sure to check of the Samsung apps loaded on the tablet. So many things to do here it will astound you. Buy it and you will never want another tablet.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Giere

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am 84. If I can use it anyone can
customer_reviews.author: Bernard J Warburton

customer_reviews.title: Love my new tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my new Samsung Galaxy Note Pro tablet for about a week and I absolutely love it! The 12.2 screen size is amazing compared to my old Samsung tablet. Opens fast and quickly surfs the web. I also love that you can open numerous Web pages at the same time or work pages. I have never used an IPad tablet so I can not compare but I have a Samsung Galaxy phone too and am very pleased with both. Highly recommend this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Item says refurbished but couldn't tell it from new. Very happy with the tablet. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: S. Zippay

customer_reviews.title: Samsung has the best electronic devices!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet and it comes with a stylus! I love it for drawing and it comes with sketchbook pro and other nice drawing apps. I use it for school and everyday fun😄 Thanks Samsung you are the best! P.S. I love your cell pbones too!!!
customer_reviews.author: DEENIE

customer_reviews.title: Every sales person should own one.
customer_reviews.text: I work in sales, so organizing and retrieving information is critical to my job. The galaxy note pro combined with my galaxy note 4 have made my life nearly paperless. The fact that I am able to take notes while talking to someone, save that information, and search for it again later (with the wonderful Evernote) has changed my work life. I LOVE THIS TABLET!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Tucker

customer_reviews.title: works flawless !!
customer_reviews.text: Wow.. this thing is perfect ! my fiancé loves it .. lightning fast , perfect size ! easy to use !! ( we have a note 4 as well) no training involved . Samsung has out done themselves with this !!
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I used to believe in the IPad, however I decided to purchase the galaxy note and I don't regret it. It is faster and the camera resolution is better. I love to keep notes and most of the time I need to write right away, I just pull out the pad's stylus, write, and save. There are many other functions to be used, that I just don't have the time to describe. I highly recommend this product. I am a believer and a fan.
customer_reviews.author: BJ73

customer_reviews.title: The best tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have used this tablet for more than three years and never has any issue with it, and now I can't imagine my self working with smaller size tabs, the screen size is generous and 3 Giga RAM can handle all applications I need to run.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung Galaxy Note Pro 12.2 is an incredible tablet. From the day it was first rumored I knew I was going to get one and it hasn't let me down. I thought it might be to big but it's not. The ability to run 4 apps at once is a great feature. All of the S-Pen features are very useful. Battery life is good, sound is very good and the screen is incredible. If you're thinking of getting one go out and try it and you'll be hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Ed S

customer_reviews.title: A movie lovers dream tablet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to upgrade my Toshiba Thrive to something newer and this is about as new as I could get. I am a fan of watching hbo go and youtube and wanted a good size screen. The 12 inch is marvelous and beutuful. For those saying it is too big, I say you are weenies. I can hold it just fine in one hand and it is super thin for its size. I love this tablet. You will too if you enjoy watching movies like me.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product by Samsung.  Extremely happy!
customer_reviews.text: The best, most awesome computing product I've purchased in two decades! Wow, what a machine ... not surprised though ... Samsung products are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: NorthWoodsHermit

customer_reviews.title: So good I may switch my iphone to a samsung now
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this tablet is big, and the pen is the greatest. My first android tablet -- up until now I've always bought Apple products, but the iPad is too small and expensive. Now I'm thinking of changing my iPhone for a Samsung. Like the android interface.
customer_reviews.author: GussieFinknottle

customer_reviews.title: Love this Gem
customer_reviews.text: Love this Gem! I've been using an iPAD for the past years and there is no comparison to the Samsung. I like the look, feel, size, speed, interactive screens, notes and stylus capabilities and on and on. I actually purchased it for personal reasons but have been using it at work. Its awesome! Goodbye Apple!!
customer_reviews.author: Phil and Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Best portable device in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Best portable device in my opinion. Very fast, excellent colors and definition. Very useful when working from home. The included Office applications are compatible with MS Office. Tons of free applications can be downloaded from Google Play store to customize it and more. This investment was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: RAMON ROMAN

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is very impressive. Since the day I bought it, I'm still finding out new things about it. The only downside I have to say about this tablet is that, like many other electronic devices except laptops, Adobe Flash Player does not work. Other than that, this tablet is simply amazing and worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Goetz

customer_reviews.title: Impressive.
customer_reviews.text: After the first 3 days of struggling to learn a new operating system, this has become a very fun and worthwhile purchase. Still trying to determine if it will replace my regular laptop, but I'm satisfied that I will get a lot of use from it and enjoy it's portability.
customer_reviews.author: Digger

customer_reviews.title: total problem item ,,,returned
customer_reviews.text: Returned ,,kept flashing & overheating ,,after researching it appears to be a common problem
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Haak

customer_reviews.title: This does everything I need it to do. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This does everything I need it to do. I needed something that had android so it could support the many textbooks apps I have, as well as being able to use office for school. It is very fast, so I never have issues. I can just turn it on and take notes, I am always prepared now.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I have had 3 tablets previously, including an air currently. I have had this device for about a month now, and I love the Galaxy Note 12.2. For business purposes, it has enough screen real estate to actually get real work done. This, combined with the precision available with the stylus make this the most used tablet I have ever had. On top of that it's big enough to enjoy magazines and the NY Times and the SF Chronicle, something I've never cared for previously on smaller screens.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J Howard

customer_reviews.title: Big screen,  vivid colors
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Christmas present for myself (2015) love that I can write notes on it in my own writing, the screen is bright and the colors are vivid, I use it everyday, as I get older, the bigger screen is great, (I can actually see what I write, lol)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has been reliable and has a beautiful screen. I docked a star for Samsung not ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this tablet for years. It has been reliable and has a beautiful screen. I docked a star for Samsung not providing timely updates to the Android OS
customer_reviews.author: Jimhadar

customer_reviews.title: Runs quite strange.
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty nice but it does a lot of strange things. Like flips around changes pages on me? While I'm looking at something and I'll just slip into something else. The virtual typing I saw it on all the videos and it had a shaded Edge mine didn't come that way? It stops letting sound through from YouTube and Netflix?
customer_reviews.author: Dorrise

customer_reviews.title: You can FaceTime with others.
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung galaxy note pro 12.2" 32 GB work well for me when I am on the go. I can access my emails, Facebook, message and do a lots more. I like this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Brenton Wynter

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective, sent in for repairs 2 times, ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived defective, sent in for repairs 2 times, still not functioning as a new one should..But when it does it is an outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Came in great shape! No dents no deep screen scratches. Looked almost new! It showed up looking like I had already owned it for 2 months so I don't feel bad about not treating it like a new device.
customer_reviews.author: Braden Larsen

customer_reviews.title: the SPen functions really well and is accurate the 12" screen is excellent for movies or work and plays HD content with ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this tablet has performed well I can work on projects without hauling around a laptop, the SPen functions really well and is accurate the 12" screen is excellent for movies or work and plays HD content with good clarity, I hope Samsung next generation model is just as good . For me this was a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Torrez

customer_reviews.title: A winner!
customer_reviews.text: With this being refurbished, I expected some quirks here and there but boy was I wrong! You can't go wrong here especially with this price. Also, a very nice unit for VPN/RDP use!
customer_reviews.author: ehlowmazon

customer_reviews.title: " which comes installed on the tablet is perfect for taking notes that can easily be transformed into ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a business tablet on a Windows platform, it has finally come on the market. "S Note," which comes installed on the tablet is perfect for taking notes that can easily be transformed into text and imported into "Hword 2014" (also on the tablet). "Hcell 2014," also on the tablet works just like MS Excel. This is a great business tool!
customer_reviews.author: J.T. H.

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Ok I have to give it to Samsung battery life is remarkable it's the galaxy note pro will give you about 10 hrs of movies on one charge pretty impressive, the screen size takes you away it's a laptop( - )the weight and everything else. Very good product I'd recommend. It to any one both for business and entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Shamaul

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Looool e this tablet and still using it. It's a work horse which is good bc I do design work on it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: I like this device
customer_reviews.text: I find the Note very useful for me. Instead of carrying a laptop I use it. In my opinion it is not too heavy and worth it because of the screen size. The multi user option is great, since I share it with my GF. All the apps are installed completely separately.
customer_reviews.author: bBozo

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet for reading sheet music
customer_reviews.text: Good tablet for reading sheet music, since that's mainly what I use it for as a musician. Nice weight and feel. Rare lag and slow speed but overall works very well. The one I received had a home button that would stick. However for reading etexts and sheet music, as well as watching videos and playing games this tablet certainly does the job quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Flores Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Best of Breed
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing tablet. The digitized 12.2" screen sets it apart from all others. Friends that are iPad owners are stunned they do not have the same capabilities in what they THOUGHT was the market leader - not any more! There are no tablets that can be compared to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bill G

customer_reviews.title: Great for drawing and art!
customer_reviews.text: A great tablet for a great price. I was sold on the Galaxy Note Pro 12.2 because of the incredible interface with the stylus for drawing and art. The pressure sensitive screen interface is far beyond any of the other tablets I tried. If you want to use a tablet for drawing and art, look no further!
customer_reviews.author: SRM

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. The resolution is amazing and I like having the choice of different color spaces and expandable memory. I switched from the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: R. King

customer_reviews.title: Love the size.
customer_reviews.text: Still has overheating problem but I just stop using for a little while. Wish this problem could be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Kerbs

customer_reviews.title: just a great android tablet period, end of story.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tablet since October 2014. it's on a swing arm pedestal next to my chair, and is used every day. I've never had a single issue with it. i have an iPad mini, and iPad pro 13 inch, and this is still my go to tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Zackery Peltier

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tablet. DO not know how I managed without ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tablet. DO not know how I managed without it,
customer_reviews.author: Paolo Mancini

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this tablet but had to return it because I ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this tablet but had to return it because I needed to be able to work in a true Java environment for my company. The picture is awesome and it can do so many things well. I ended up having to go to a surface pro 3 instead which was twice the price but has java.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for reading and annotating pdfs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tablet to read and annotate pdfs comfortably (I use the LectureNotes and ezPDFReader apps). Samsung's sPen is incredibly responsive and comfortable to use. Handwriting on this tablet feels very natural, almost like on paper!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: SO IN LOVE. It's just right for me
customer_reviews.text: SO IN LOVE. It's just right for me. It's paired with the Logitech keyboard cover and an HP Bluetooh mouse and I have the perfect portable machine. I am a big fan of the S-pen (also have a Galaxy Note 2 phone).
customer_reviews.author: SCB

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy 12.2 is great
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this tablet. The picture quality is much better then the iPad which I also own. 12.2 is the perfect size for watching videos. Highly recommend the Galaxy 12.2 over the iPad. Great replacement for a laptop also.
customer_reviews.author: dredog

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied with product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture, quick response to commands and easy to download links/app's. Difficult to locate new 64gb so purchased a new 32gb tablet instead. No issues to report, very satisfied . . . .
customer_reviews.author: Keli P. May

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: I use this for Facebook and weather. Takes good photos as well.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Price

customer_reviews.title: I love this Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love this Tablet. It is Amazing. I am glad I made the choice to buy it. Has been looking for an Outstanding Tablet and this is it. Buy this tablet and you will not regret it !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Love it! So versatile and meets any professional needs-but ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! So versatile and meets any professional needs-but Meeting Go is limited to the same network-very limited. That was the main reason for my choosing the Note Pro over the Pro. But I'm happy because I got the Note Pro for less than I would have gotten the Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy Samsung if you rely on your device!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could do zero stars. Only reason I have a tablet is for sheet music and I use an airturn Bluetooth pedal for turning pages. Worked great until Samsung just sent out an update that disabled all Bluetooth keyboards and mice except for Samsung branded accessories. As a musician this device is now a paperweight and I have to resort back to several binders full of sheet music and pausing to turn pages. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C

customer_reviews.title: This is the best tablet I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tablet I've ever owned. The first thing everyone says when they see it is "Wow, that's huge". I've had the Galaxy Note Pro 12.2 for six months now and it's still fast and powerful. The pinpoint stylus is so much better than those bulky rubber nubs that you buy for other touch screens. The only feature I really wish I had is a USB port so I can connect an external harddrive instead of having to transfer files using the Micro SD card.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Irreplaceable
customer_reviews.text: After having this tablet for a while, I can't say enough about it. I have pretty much completely replaced my computer with this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: John T Benefield

customer_reviews.title: Huge Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Huge Tablet with Samsung quality build I just wish they would update the TouchWiz and Android versions.
customer_reviews.author: AmbivalentMe

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Had a few glitches at first when trying to run a movie in full screen mode, got a lot of screen flickering, but only needed a reset to set it straight. A bit heavy/bulky, but nothing to complain about given the massive screen size. Quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: PenName

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it so far except that it seems to lose charge rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend and he loves it a lot. Used it everyday and is comfortable and happy with it. Used it for school and all his projects. Just need the updates to come out faster.
customer_reviews.author: DarlingB

customer_reviews.title: I loved my own so much that we had to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved my own so much that we had to buy one for my husband. Arrived on schedule, and in perfect order.
customer_reviews.author: VANESSA Y. MCCLINCHY

customer_reviews.title: Great Device
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for about two weeks so far afteri got it and it is great. Does everything i want and more. Just buy the keyboard with it and you got yourself a super light laptop replacement. Can't beat it and way cheaper then buying something like the surface from Microsoft. If you just need office and not a desktop replacement then you are set. Works great as a desktop compliment.
customer_reviews.author: Ironeagle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very happy, and if ever need be, we would order again from same place
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tablet I love it great service will order from them again thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ice man

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design for business use
customer_reviews.text: As the developer of electronic healthcare records, I find this design to be an excellent platform for our software. I think that for anyone desiring an Android tablet for business use this is an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the pen and bigger screen. So far so good.thanks
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Said it Before and Saying it Again. I Love Samsung!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet! It is large enough to be a laptop but perfect for long plane rides. Great battery life and speed. Couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Anderson

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy NotePRO 12.2 Black - tablets (Full-size tablet, Android, Slate, Android, Black, Calculator, Calendar, Events reminder, Notes, To-do list)
product_meta.description: Samsung Galaxy NotePRO - tablet - Android 4.4 (KitKat) - 32 GB - 12.2"
